entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3 except plus 1 along the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3 except plus 1 along the coast. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
